titleStmt.title: John Boyle to W. H. Sidell
CWG14171

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p:
221
Nov. 3rd 3
Maj. W. H. Sidell -- U. S. A.
A. A. Pro. Mar. Genl.
Louisville -- Ky.
Major,

Your communication to the Governor has been referred to this Department. It has been determined to make each County in the State a sub-District -- within the meaning of the Provost Marshal General, and arrangements are now making to accurately determine the quota of each county under the late call.
For this prupose of general order will issue in a few days -- as soon as possible -- assigning the number to be raised in each sub-District -- and you shall be supplied with it.

Respectfully,
Your ob't serv't
John Boyle
Adj't. Gen of Ky
